message:
I am not able to post questions any more on SO "I was automatically banned" and when I contacted them to unban me they said 

"Your block was triggered automatically by the system because most of your posts have not been well-received by the community — meaning they were either downvoted or not voted on at all. We cannot lift posting blocks – you must improve your existing posts in order for the system to allow you to participate further. You are able to edit your posts. When you do, they move to the top of the queue, allowing the community the chance to upvote them."

Can you please find out how to regain again the ability to post questions ?

I thought of somethings:
1. You vote up some of my non/down voted questions.
2. Someone of you can delete the down voted questions from my profile?
story: Osama Soliman shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: User Microsmsm
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: Q&A for professional and enthusiast programmers

data.message: Frankly i am feed up with SOF. I find their community, support and their whole system to be arrogant and harsh, I prefer to get my support elsewhere.

Home come you have 510 reputation and banned!!!
I know a lot of people who have 0 ~ 15 votes and they were never banned from SOF
